none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 09, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Goddamn, these Aussies are just straight fukkn fire. It's as if the Birdmen themselves crash landed in a pile of early '00s punk infused indie - I'm talking NEW RACE by way of STROKES or FRANZ FERDINAND reimagining HITMEN here, and Perth's LAST QUOKKA are flawlessly on point for all of it. Jam "My Girl" into "Piggy" and know that you've found it...and you can find a lot more here. RED DIRT...and there were grass stains on my jeans...
https://lastquokka.bandcamp.com/music

seo.title: Last Quokka - Red Dirt - Terminal Escape
